item.title: OLAP
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about OLAP ChatGPT answer: What is OLAP and what are its key features? What are the key differences between OLAP and OLTP? What are the benefits of using OLAP in business intelligence? How does OLAP facilitate data analysis and decision-making? What are some common OLAP tools and technologies used in the industry? Explain User ask: Explain OLAP and give an example ChatGPT answer:
